original_text: CIBC has 10 People Networks with how many members around the globe?
ans: CIBC has 10 People Networks with over 23,000 members around the globe.

original_text: CIBC’s efforts to create a more digital and mobile workplace accelerated when the pandemic struck. Nearly overnight, we moved how many team members to working remotely.?
ans: CIBC’s efforts to create a more digital and mobile workplace accelerated when the pandemic struck. Nearly overnight, we moved approximately 30,000 team members to working remotely.
